mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat.match (CUS_UID1, CUS_UID2, MATCH_CREATE_TIME, MATCH_END_TIME) VALUES (#{customerUid1}, #{customerUid2}, #{createTime}, #{endTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE chat.match SET CUS_UID1 = #{customerUid1}, CUS_UID2 = #{customerUid2}, MATCH_CREATE_TIME = #{createTime}, MATCH_END_TIME = #{endTime} WHERE CUS_UID1 = #{customerUid1} AND MATCH_END_TIME = '1970-01-01 00:00:00'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat.match WHERE CUS_UID2 = #{uid} AND MATCH_END_TIME = '1970-01-01 00:00:00' OR CUS_UID1 = #{uid} AND MATCH_END_TIME = '1970-01-01 00:00:00'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM chat.`match` WHERE CUS_UID1 = #{customerUid1} AND CUS_UID2 = #{customerUid2}
